sqls.test: select i.close,n.LJJZ,substring_index(i.rowkey,"_",1),substring_index(n.rowkey,"_",1) from index i inner join netval n on substr(i.rowkey,instr(i.rowkey,"_")+1)=substr(n.rowkey,instr(n.rowkey,"_")+1)
sqls.test2:
select substr(n.rowkey,instr(n.rowkey,"_")+1) from netval n
where substring_index(i.rowkey,"_",1)='SH000300' and substring_index(n.rowkey,"_",1)='161604'
